system.requirements:
Tier 3: Inquisitor E.Adv, Fated, Intelligence 50, Perception 50, Willpower 55.
Aptitudes: Knowledge, Willpower
system.effect: Before rolling the d100 when making a test. The Inquisitor can spend a Fate Point to count as having rolled a 01 on that roll.

description.value: Before rolling the d100 when making a test. The Inquisitor can spend a Fate Point to count as having rolled a 01 on that roll.
